title: Sun Transit in the 7th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: The Sun transiting your seventh house highlights partnerships, marriage, and public dealings. Identity becomes closely tied to how you relate one-to-one, and there is a strong desire to lead or set terms within relationships. Confidence shows in negotiations and client interactions, but ego clashes can surface if equality is overlooked. When approached consciously, this transit strengthens dignified partnerships, fair leadership in alliances, and mutual respect in personal and professional bonds.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Need to assert authority in one-to-one settings.
Balance between self and others becomes key.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Ego clashes possible if dominance rises.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Income through partnerships or clients increases.

sections.heading: Mental & Inner State
points: Awareness of self versus others sharpens.

closing: The Sun in the 7th house teaches leadership through partnership. When authority is shared, relationships become strong and respected.
